entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 3:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 43 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain and then changing to rain before morning. Fog patches developing before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Freezing rain inland early in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing rain inland in the evening. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4 except minus 2 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4 except minus 2 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
